# Pull Request

## Summary

Brief description of what this PR does and why.

## Changes

- List the key changes in this PR
- Focus on what changed and why, not how
- Keep it high-level and readable

## Testing

- [ ] All tests pass locally (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] Linters pass locally (`golangci-lint run`)
- [ ] Markdown linting passes (`markdownlint **/*.md`)
- [ ] Manual testing completed (if applicable)

## Documentation

- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if workflow/standards changed)

## Checklist

- [ ] Commit messages follow semantic format (`type(scope): description`)
- [ ] No secrets or credentials in code
- [ ] Breaking changes documented (if any)
- [ ] Related issues referenced (if any)

## Additional Notes

Any additional information reviewers should know.
